titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on the chemical 2 Chloro Amino Toluene.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/22/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2004, the duty on 2 chloro amino toluene.
